Name: Furry Arena [18+]
About the game: Furry Arena [18+] is a first-person multiplayer shooter, set in a future filled with sexy furries. In the game's primary competitive mode, players are arranged into two teams and compete on a variety of maps and game types. The next generation of competitive gaming is here. Experience the most intense fight against real players and highly skilled artificial intelligence with a big variety of arsenal and gorgeous maps. Choose a side or be a lone wolf, the choice is yours. Currently available in 3 game modes (DM, TDM, Domination) with 3 maps. Features Competitive shooter with an erotic twist Intense combat gunplay for hardcore gamers Plenty of Adult Content to unlock
